name: Adventures of the Little Red Blob
name_original: Adventures of the Little Red Blob
description:
This collection of three mini games is created for my school project Singapore Kaleidoscope, which requires trainee teachers to  encapsulate what we feel about Singapore's society, culture and heritage in one artwork. At the time of creation, Singapore was undergoing a circuit breaker period, when non-essential services were suspended on the island for one month so as to mitigate the spread of COVID-19. 

The mini games are inspired by important precautions that teachers give their students in school - practicing social distancing, avoiding unnecessary purchases, and fighting the war against COVID-19 by playing our part.

Character and game designs created on Powerpoint and Gamemaker Studio 2. Background from SlidesGo. Music from bensound.com.
